AboutDescription:
I am a professional Front-End Developer with over two years of experience designing and developing modern, interactive user interfaces using the latest web technologies. I possess strong skills in:

HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for building responsive structures and layouts.

Bootstrap and Tailwind CSS to create elegant, fast-responsive interfaces that support various devices and screens.

React.js for developing dynamic and scalable web applications, with experience managing state using Context API and Redux.

I am also proficient with version control tools like Git and GitHub to work within teams and organize code professionally.

I have extensive experience integrating APIs to connect front-end interfaces with back-end systems, enabling smooth and seamless applications. I always consider performance optimization, fast loading, and user experience to ensure cross-browser compatibility.

I focus on applying best UX/UI design standards and continuously learn modern technologies to deliver innovative, high-quality projects that meet and exceed client expectations.
ManyProjects: Many completed projects across various fields (commercial, educational, personal)
ReactApps: Building responsive and fast React applications

items.name: Anas Fawzy
items.review:
Working with Engineer Hassan was a smooth and successful experience from start to finish. He quickly understood the specifics of our field and translated our needs into a practical and user-friendly system.

The website was delivered in a clean and organized way, helping us present our services professionally, with excellent performance and easy navigation on both mobile and desktop devices.

What truly stood out was the continuous follow-up, attention to small details, and fast response to any requested changes or improvements.

Honestly, his work is reliable, and I would recommend him to anyone looking for a website that genuinely supports their business in a professional way.

items.name: Maysara Hany
items.review:
I had the pleasure of working with Engineer Hassan on the design and development of our companyâ€™s website, and the experience was outstanding in every aspect.

From a technical standpoint, the work was highly professional. The website is fast, well-structured, and fully responsive across all devices. All requirements were implemented accurately, with smooth and practical integration between the dashboard and the database.

On a professional level, there was a strong commitment to deadlines, great flexibility with revisions, and a quick understanding of any feedback or new ideas, along with proposing suitable technical solutions that fit the nature of our business.

I highly recommend working with him for any web project that requires quality, organization, and attention to detail.
